alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:25PM CDT until May 08 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTY... At 525 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near La Grange to Muldoon, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Muldoon, Floy, Swiss Alp, Plum, Rutersville, Ammannsville, O`Quinn, Colony, West Point, Mullins Prairie and Holman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
